alert.note: Alert for Clay; Jackson; Macon; Overton; Putnam; Smith; Trousdale (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 26 at 1:44AM CDT until June 26 at 2:30AM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Nashville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Overton County in Middle Tennessee... Northern Smith County in Middle Tennessee... Jackson County in Middle Tennessee... Clay County in Middle Tennessee... Macon County in Middle Tennessee... Trousdale County in Middle Tennessee... Northwestern Putnam County in Middle Tennessee... * Until 230 AM CDT. * At 144 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Red Boiling Springs, or 9 miles southeast of Lafayette, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Cookeville, Lafayette, Livingston, Carthage, Celina, Gainesboro, Hartsville, Algood, Red Boiling Springs, South Carthage, Whitleyville, Moss, Dixon Springs, Pleasant Shade, Rickman, Granville, Dale Hollow Lake, Cummins Falls State Park and Standing Stone State Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Clay; Jackson; Macon; Overton; Putnam; Smith; Trousdale
